title: BREAKING: Five Wounded, Four Killed In Early Morning Shooting at Kansas City Bar
text:
A shooting broke out at the Tequila KC Bar in Kansas City, Missouri early Sunday morning. Authorities say a total of nine people were shot, four of which succumbed to their injuries. The remaining five were taken to Truman Medical and University of Kansas Health System and are in stable condition.

TJ Tomasic of the Kansas City Police Department told ABC News the police received a call at 1:27 a.m. reporting the shooting.

9 shot, 4 dead at 10th and Central Ave. — KCKPD (@KCKPDHQ) October 6, 2019

The suspect, said to be a Hispanic male, walked into the bar and began shooting with a handgun. Casings from a handgun were found at the scene.

"Detectives are here and are looking at any surveillance," Tomasic told KSHB-TV. "This is definitely one of those that we’re going to do everything very slowly, very methodically and correctly."

Police are unsure if there was just one shooter. As of now, no suspect is in custody.

Agents from the Department of Alcohol, Tobacco, Firearms and Explosives (ATF) are on scene working with the Kansas City Police Department.

Agents from @ATFKansasCity are responding to the shooting scene at 10th and Central in Kansas City, KS. @KCKPDHQ for information and updates. pic.twitter.com/u9hnYvD25R — ATF Kansas City (@ATFKansasCity) October 6, 2019

KSHB-TV reporter Nick Starling shared pictures and footage from the scene:

On scene near 10th and Central where officers responded to a shooting. 9 total people were shot 4 of the 9 are dead. We are told the suspect entered the bar Tequila KC and started shooting.

Police are still looking for the suspect. @41actionnews pic.twitter.com/5kwX69IkVF — Nick Starling (@NickStarlingTV) October 6, 2019

This is what the scene looks like from Baltimore and Central Ave. @41actionnews pic.twitter.com/EMTLFc2nUV — Nick Starling (@NickStarlingTV) October 6, 2019

A truly heartbreaking moment, a circle of woman hugging one another, crying outside at a bar where 9 people were shot, 4 died in KCK. @41actionnews pic.twitter.com/ljiyuIQRuQ — Nick Starling (@NickStarlingTV) October 6, 2019

This is a breaking news story. As more information comes in this article will be updated.
